mean_cn: n.独裁者，独裁政权执政者；口授令他人做笔录者
mean_en: a person who behaves as if they have complete power over other people, and tells them what to do; a ruler who has complete power over a country, especially one who has gained it using military force
sentence: My boss acts like a dictator to his employees.
sentence_trans: 我的老板像一个独裁者那样对待员工。
word_etyma: dictat命令 + or名词后缀：人 → dictator 命令者，独裁者
